Uses of Class
main.java.logic.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    main.java.networking
    The Networking package encompasses everything needed for playing Sudoku on a multiplayer basis.
    main.java.ui
    This package is responsible for creating and maintaining this User Interface.

    • Uses of Controller in main.java.networking

      Constructors in main.java.networking with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      SudokuSender(Controller control)
      This constructor makes a packet for removing a player.
      SudokuSender(Controller control, boolean isGame)
      Creates a sender to get games.
      SudokuSender(Controller control, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, java.lang.String message)
      This constructor makes a packet for messages.
      SudokuSender(Controller control, Square... squares)
      This constructor makes a packet for Squares.

    • Uses of Controller in main.java.ui

      Methods in main.java.ui that return Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Controller GameUI.getControl()
      Gets the controller.
      Constructors in main.java.ui with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      Chat(Controller control)
      Creates a new Chat with default width of 300.
      Chat(double chatWidth, Controller control)
      Creates a new Chat with the given width.
      GameUI(Controller control)
      Creates a complete visual representation of the current Sudoku Game.
